parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: Additional message-specific information defined by the application

title: ISldWorks.PostMessageToApplication
description: Posts a message to the application that invoked this method.
signature:
void PostMessageToApplication( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.Int32
UserData
)

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: Additional message-specific information defined by the application

remarks:
If your application must be x64 compatible, then use
ISldWorks::PostMessageToApplicationx64
.
